trans-unit.source: Contains an authentication message for an Internet server.
trans-unit.target: 包含 Internet 服务器的身份验证消息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.AuthenticationManager> returns an instance of the Authorization class that contains an authentication message.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.AuthenticationManager>返回一个包含身份验证消息的授权类的实例。</xref:System.Net.AuthenticationManager>

trans-unit.source: This message is sent to the Internet server to indicate that the client (such as <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> or one of its descendants) is authorized to access the server.
trans-unit.target: 此消息发送到 Internet 服务器，则指示客户端 (如<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>或其后代之一) 有权访问服务器。</xref:System.Net.WebRequest>

trans-unit.source: The Authorization instance is created by the authentication module that the <xref:System.Net.AuthenticationManager> designates to handle the request.
trans-unit.target: 授权实例由身份验证模块创建的<xref:System.Net.AuthenticationManager>指定用来处理该请求。</xref:System.Net.AuthenticationManager>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Authorization"></xref> class with the specified authorization message.
trans-unit.target: 创建的新实例<xref href="System.Net.Authorization"></xref>与指定的授权消息的类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Authorization> instance is created with the <xref:System.Net.Authorization.Message%2A> property set to `token` and the <xref:System.Net.Authorization.Complete%2A> property set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Authorization>使用创建实例<xref:System.Net.Authorization.Message%2A>属性设置为`token`和<xref:System.Net.Authorization.Complete%2A>属性设置为`true`。</xref:System.Net.Authorization.Complete%2A> </xref:System.Net.Authorization.Message%2A> </xref:System.Net.Authorization>

trans-unit.source: The encrypted authorization message expected by the server.
trans-unit.target: 服务器所需的已加密的授权消息。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Authorization"></xref> class with the specified authorization message and completion status.
trans-unit.target: 创建的新实例<xref href="System.Net.Authorization"></xref>类特定的授权消息和完成状态。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Authorization> instance is created with the <xref:System.Net.Authorization.Message%2A> property set to `token` and the <xref:System.Net.Authorization.Complete%2A> property set to `finished`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Authorization>使用创建实例<xref:System.Net.Authorization.Message%2A>属性设置为`token`和<xref:System.Net.Authorization.Complete%2A>属性设置为`finished`。</xref:System.Net.Authorization.Complete%2A> </xref:System.Net.Authorization.Message%2A> </xref:System.Net.Authorization>

trans-unit.source: The encrypted authorization message expected by the server.
trans-unit.target: 服务器所需的已加密的授权消息。

trans-unit.source: The completion status of the authorization attempt.
trans-unit.target: 授权尝试完成状态。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the authorization attempt is complete; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果授权尝试已完成;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Authorization"></xref> class with the specified authorization message, completion status, and connection group identifier.
trans-unit.target: 创建的新实例<xref href="System.Net.Authorization"></xref>使用指定的授权消息、 完成状态和连接组标识符的类。

trans-unit.source: The encrypted authorization message expected by the server.
trans-unit.target: 服务器所需的已加密的授权消息。

trans-unit.source: The completion status of the authorization attempt.
trans-unit.target: 授权尝试完成状态。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the authorization attempt is complete; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果授权尝试已完成;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A unique identifier that can be used to create private client-server connections that are bound only to this authentication scheme.
trans-unit.target: 可以用于创建专用客户端-服务器只能绑定到此身份验证方案的连接的唯一标识符。

trans-unit.source: Gets the completion status of the authorization.
trans-unit.target: 获取授权的完成状态。

trans-unit.source: The Complete property is set to `true` when the authentication process between the client and the server is finished.
trans-unit.target: 完整的属性设置为`true`完成客户端和服务器之间的身份验证过程。

trans-unit.source: Some authentication modules, such as the Kerberos module, use multiple round trips between the client and server to complete the authentication process.
trans-unit.target: 某些身份验证模块，如 Kerberos 模块中，使用多个客户端和服务器之间的往返过程来完成身份验证过程。

trans-unit.source: To keep the <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> or descendant that initiated the authentication process from interrupting while authorization is taking place, the authentication module sets the Complete property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要保留<xref:System.Net.WebRequest>或子代，启动从中断的身份验证过程进行授权时，身份验证模块的完整属性设置为`false`。</xref:System.Net.WebRequest>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the authentication process is complete; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果身份验证过程已完成;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a unique identifier for user-specific connections.
trans-unit.target: 获取特定于用户的连接的唯一标识符。

trans-unit.source: The ConnectionGroupId property is a unique string that associates a connection with a specific authenticating entity.
trans-unit.target: ConnectionGroupId 属性是将连接与特定的身份验证实体相关联的唯一字符串。

trans-unit.source: For example, the NTLM authorization module ties the authentication credential information to a specific connection to prevent invalid reuse of the connection.
trans-unit.target: 例如，NTLM 授权模块会绑定到特定的连接，以防止无效重复使用此连接的身份验证凭据信息。

trans-unit.source: A unique string that associates a connection with an authenticating entity.
trans-unit.target: 将连接与身份验证的实体相关联的唯一字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets the message returned to the server in response to an authentication challenge.
trans-unit.target: 获取返回到对身份验证质询的响应中的服务器的消息。

trans-unit.source: The Message property contains the authorization string that the client will return to the server when accessing protected resources.
trans-unit.target: 消息属性包含在访问受保护资源时，客户端将返回到服务器的授权字符串。

trans-unit.source: The actual contents of the message are defined by the authentication type the client and server are using.
trans-unit.target: 由客户端和服务器所使用的身份验证类型定义的消息的实际内容。

trans-unit.source: Basic HTTP authentication, for example, uses a different message than Kerberos authentication.
trans-unit.target: 基本 HTTP 身份验证，例如，使用比 Kerberos 身份验证不同的消息。

trans-unit.source: When an authentication module supports preauthentication, the Message property is sent with the initial request.
trans-unit.target: 当身份验证模块支持预身份验证时，与初始请求发送的消息属性。

trans-unit.source: The message that will be returned to the server in response to an authentication challenge.
trans-unit.target: 将返回到对身份验证质询的响应中的服务器消息。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether mutual authentication occurred.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref:System.Boolean>值，该值指示是否发生了相互身份验证。</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: This property returns `false` if the authentication has not completed.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回`false`如果未完成身份验证。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if both client and server were authenticated; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果客户端和服务器均经过验证;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the prefix for Uniform Resource Identifiers (URIs) that can be authenticated with the <xref:System.Net.Authorization.Message*> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置统一资源标识符 (Uri) 可以使用身份验证的前缀<xref:System.Net.Authorization.Message*>属性。</xref:System.Net.Authorization.Message*>

trans-unit.source: The ProtectionRealm property contains a list of URI prefixes that the <xref:System.Net.Authorization.Message%2A> property can be used to authenticate.
trans-unit.target: ProtectionRealm 属性包含的列表 URI 前缀<xref:System.Net.Authorization.Message%2A>属性可以用于进行身份验证。</xref:System.Net.Authorization.Message%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.WebRequest> and its descendants compare a URI to this list to determine if the <xref:System.Net.Authorization> is valid for a particular URI.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.WebRequest>和其后代进行比较以确定此列表的 URI<xref:System.Net.Authorization>特定 uri 无效。</xref:System.Net.Authorization></xref:System.Net.WebRequest>

trans-unit.source: An array of strings that contains URI prefixes.
trans-unit.target: 包含 URI 的前缀的字符串数组。
